| History                 = Several years after the apparent death of [[Zheng Zu (Earth-616)|Fu Manchu]], the '''Sleeping Dragon Clan''' and three other [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]] had divided up his former criminal empire according to intel from [[MI6 (Earth-616)|MI6]]. Leading the clan at the time was the elderly crimelord, [[Chiang Kai-Dong (Earth-616)|Chiang Kai-Dong]].{{r|X-Men Vol 2 62}} The Triad was one of several that came under the rule of the [[Zheng Bao Yu (Earth-616)|Cursed Lotus]] when she united Hong Kong's underworld and used the Triads to expand her drug empire.{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 1 514}}
